results.title: Expanded View – removal of the Mini TV within some Sky Q menus
results.description: We’re always looking for ways to improve your experience when using Sky Q. After trying multiple different variations of design and navigation, we felt removing the Mini TV from some of the menus within the Sky Q navigation allowed us to expand the information and amount of content we could show case to you at one time.
